website_summaries.verdict: A decent, mid-price option that is slightly more expensive than the Cetaphil.
pros: An effective, affordable cream that also comes with a pleasant scent
Hydrates your skin without feeling greasy
cons: Extremely expensive - even for just 2 fluid ounces

customer_reviews.title: Best. Handcream. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy. Smells good even for a guy - kind of 'green'. Lasts and really keeps your hands soft and not wrinkly. I keep a big pump bottle at home and use it in the morning right before I put on my watch and wedding ring, and I keep this tube on my desk at work. Buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Beckvonpeccoz

customer_reviews.title: A Gardeners 'Must Have'
customer_reviews.text: I'm gardening 3-4 days a week. Push mower, weeding, trimming, planting... I don't like to wear gloves and my hands look and feel like they belong to a corpse, buried for 2 weeks. I put this creme on 2 hours before I make dinner and a second application as we sit down for dinner. My husband can't tell if I've been working in dirt all day. I'll use it 2-3 times a day during winter to combat the dryness. I love the soothing scent and the 'invisible glove' feeling it gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Mandingo

customer_reviews.title: A long time favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love Crabtree and Evelyn. My mom and I used to go buy these lotions and powders in a little shop in town. My mother passed away in September 2015 so when I saw this (and the Nantucket Briar scent) I ordered both and whenever I put it on my hands, I close my eyes and am back with my mom. I bought it for the memory but honestly it is a wonderful smell and it is not greasy. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LesDen

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed that Crabtree & Evelyn discontinued the Lavender Hand Therapy
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that Crabtree & Evelyn discontinued the Lavender Hand Therapy. The new Lavender and Espresso's fragrance is much too strong for me. I can't tell that it has lavender in it. The only reason I gave it a second star was that the rich, non-greasy texture is the same. Unfortunately, the strong, masculine fragrance is not to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Oliveri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but very tiny. I expected something a little larger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Fake
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cream for decades, but this particular cream is NOTHING like the old one. The old cream had an appealing soft scent. This one has an offensive male cologne smell. It is so strong, I had to wash my hands immediately. The old cream visibly hydrated my skin. Not this one. I am guessing this cream is a cheap knockoff. Don't waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This lotion smells amazing! It's also better quality than L'Occitane
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells amazing! It's also better quality than L'Occitane. Problem: this is now my second lotion that I haven't been able to finish because the container breaks at the seam. Waste of money. I'd prefer this come in a glass bottle.
customer_reviews.author: alopez.sewell

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my sister, but everytime I give it to her I ask to use some. The lotion is just like all Crabtree lotions, thick ane rich and nourishing. The scent is amazing. It isn't that powdery cloying rose scent. This smells like an actual real rose and isn't overbearing. I wouldn't ever get this for myself, i'm a guy and it's just too floral for me...but if you like natural scented roses, you'll love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: I used to use Aveeno with Menthol and loved it, but Aveeno discontinued making their skin care ...
customer_reviews.text: I have problems in the winter time with my skin splitting open at the tip of my finger nails. this ultra-moisturizing hand cream worked well. Unfortunately, I think it's too expensive. I used to use Aveeno with Menthol and loved it, but Aveeno discontinued making their skin care product with Menthol. I will not purchase Crabtree & Evelyn again because of the high cost for such a small amount. I am still searching for something as good as the discontinued Aveeno for the price I used to pay for Aveeno.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what its advertised to do
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is advertised to do. The aroma is wonderful and I have purchased this product several times because it makes my hands feel soft without being sticky at all and the aroma is romantic.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Acker-Missall

customer_reviews.title: The rosewater and pink peppercorn scent is sooo lovely!
customer_reviews.text: The rosewater and pink peppercorn scent is sooo lovely!!! I wish it also came in a body spray, I always want to smell like this! Perfect size to keep a hand cream in your purse. I have really dry hands and rarely put lotion on because I don't like the feel of lotion on my hands. This cream feels nice and not too oily, plus I love the scent so much I'm sure I won't have a problem remembering to put cream on multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for the classic “Crabtree & Evelyn” rose scent. Instead, I found it to be very chemically and putrid, much like a knock-off lotion from the dollar store. Threw it it the trash, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allisonne Ramsburg

customer_reviews.title: has a nice, no nonsense
customer_reviews.text: I should have focused on the ounces. I assumed it was fairly large; it used to be! So there I was looking in the box, when this teeny tiny wee bit of a tube came tumbling out. Ah well. The cream is not sticky and, though a bit strong at first, has a nice, no nonsense, scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cerulean Artist

customer_reviews.title: but Crabtree & Evelyn has best fragrance and texture
customer_reviews.text: I've tried out most of hand lotions out there, but Crabtree & Evelyn has best fragrance and texture. It's a bit pricey but totally worth it. EXCEPT, the tubes for a larger size always get torn apart. This is really disappointing given the price and the quality of what's inside. At first, I thought that it was because I carried it around in my bag (I'm trying out other travel-sized hand lotions but none meets my standard!). But now with this one, I'm using it just at home but the same thing's happening again! I wish they could do better with packaging so that I can go on buy these.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant!
customer_reviews.text: The texture is great for dry "winter skin", and the scent is light and floral. I love this hand cream and buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: The scent is terrific, but
customer_reviews.text: I love Crabtree and Evelyn's Verbena and Lavender products. The scent is intoxicating. This Hand Cream Therapy doesn't disappoint when it comes to the scent. The product itself, however, was lackluster. I'm not sure what was therapeutic about it. I applied it, then a few moments later it felt a little rubbery, and then nothing. Other than the great smell, it's like I'd never applied it. If you simply want to smell amazing, this will do the trick. But don't expect it to moisturize - or even do anything for - your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Poetry Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion, but not crazy about this scent
customer_reviews.text: I like some of the Crabtree & Evelyn hand creams and decided to try some additional scents. This one is not for me - too old-lady-ish, I guess I would say. Then again, I usually don't care for lavender. The espresso is imperceptible, and I don't find it calming, but rather a little bit irritating. I would recommend looking for testers in a store to see which ones you like, especially given the price.
customer_reviews.author: akr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scented Hand Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I came across this at a particular hotel in Portland, Oregon. The brick and mortar store doesn't exist in the Bellevue Square in Bellevue, WA. I was glad to have found it on Amazon. I bought this travel size and the larger size hand lotions, including the body lotion. So FRAGRANT!
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMacy

customer_reviews.title: Good aroma for the recipient who does not like lavender scents.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this hand cream as a gift but the aroma was very good for the recipient who does not like lavender scents.
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Very small not worth 8 bucks
customer_reviews.text: This product is so small not work 8 bucks more like 4 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet

customer_reviews.title: It has quite obviously been laying on a shelf for ...
customer_reviews.text: It has quite obviously been laying on a shelf for a long time. 1) The tube edges were cracked wuth age 2) The seal was stuck solidly to the cap and not the tube of cream 3) So old the cream had separated and had NO scent
customer_reviews.author: LaLaPetite

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had always heard of this brand but never tried it. So glad I finally did! It is amazing. The smell is not overpowering, very fresh and exactly my style. Even though it is on the pricey side, i Definitely will be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Mcountryman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Floral Scent With a hint of spice
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in my cosmetic bag. I love the floral / spicy scent. The hand cream is thick enough to be substantial but blends easily into my skin without being greasy. I can put this on my hands and type away on my computer without getting a film on the keys and mouse. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: GROSS
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. I really don’t like the smell of this at all. I gave it to my mom. It smells like dirty old man. I really didn’t expect that from C and E. People say it smells like rosemary? Where are they smelling rosemary like this?! It smells like cheap car freshener. Oh god just writing this is making me sick. 🤢
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Sometimes

customer_reviews.title: Scent is too sweet for me
customer_reviews.text: The lotion is fine - about the same as their others, I think, despite the argan oil (I have no idea whether that's any better than any of the other oils they use) - but the scent is very sweet, like junior high school lip gloss. If you're looking for something fruity, perhaps you'll like it, but for me it was too much. I think I'll stick with my original C&E favorites, La Source & Tarocco Orange. Caribbean Wildflower is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: akr

customer_reviews.title: It smells OK, but not what expected, nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: It smells OK, but not what expected, nothing exotic (Carribean). Hands are smooth but if will help keep hands hydrated, we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved finding Crabtree & Evelyn hand cream still existed!
customer_reviews.text: ... and that the long-loved rose fragrance was among their products. While usually too expensive to bestow upon myself... LOVE LOVE to receive gifts from their selections -- especially the hand and/or body creams. This was the first time in probably 20 years that I've actually purchased their hand cream for myself. Guess I just decided I was worth the expense!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam and Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This is my very favorite hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my very favorite hand lotion. I have used it for years, and nothing else compares for me. It is fantastic for dry hands and has a lovely, spicy scent. It's hard to find that combination of effectiveness and nice scent in hand lotions that actually work well! It is on the pricey side, but high quality and definitely worth it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyJacksMom

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely love the way it feels--not greasy and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift a few years ago, and absolutely love the way it feels--not greasy and smells great. Although it is a bit pricey, I got it for a pretty fair deal considering some of the other vendor prices, and it does last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Marlette

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this was going to be a great cream but no, it was not. The smell was overwhelming. Thats not to say it didnt smell good a first little whiff, but it was just too strong after applied even with a small amount. I didnt find it was any better in relation to helping the skin in my hands then most other lotions at a lower cost. Wont be ordering again and dont recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The cream is either too watery or too creamy and help a lot with dry skin; the scent is light and refreshing. Former ones I bought (e.g., L'Occitane Cherry Blossom/Rose) are too strong and even make me feel dizzy. Highly recommended if you are like me who prefer a light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Magic Hand Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who doesn't like lotion, and doesn't care for scented things. This stuff is amazing. It heals my skin, doesn't feel like lotion, and smells like... sandlewood or something. Just awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Swaim

customer_reviews.title: Too much of a sage scent.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion because I love orange scented lotions and with the eucalyptus it sounded really good. Plus, I like the quality of Crabtree & Evelyn body creams. I was a little disappointed with this lotion. First off it does smell good, but the sage scent is more dominant. I can barely smell the orange in it, and I really can't smell the eucalyptus too much at all.
customer_reviews.author: B. Amaris

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don't have experience with Crabtree & Evelyn so I had no idea what to expect from this lotion, but the description of the scent made me curious. I'm glad I took the chance because love it, it's citrus-y but also spicy. It's more of a gender neutral smell than a feminine one; it smells fresh and clean. I'd ordered a smaller size to try it out and ended up buying the full-sized tube after I smelled it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for mom because she loves rose scented lotion and her hands get very dry in the winter. She loved the way it smells and has noticed that her hands are softer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Check Price Per Ounce!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good however extremely overpriced for such a small amount. This probably was my own fault for not checking the weight of product in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Alexina McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lotion
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lotion. The only thing wrong and why I gave this product only 3 out of 5 stars is the smell. Sometimes it can give me headaches. The smell lingers as if I have to put the lotion away or wipe my hands off. It gets super strong to the point where I have to blow my nose. Other than that, it's not a bad product. The smell of the lotion could be a little more natural, not perfumed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lotion for hands and elbows. I use it nightly and it helped with hang nails and rough elbows. I have been using this for years but it was priced better on Amazon then on Crabtree and Evelyn web site.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Mahecha

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I actually would give this product no stars. It smell is very light does not seem authentic and does not last on you. I would not recommend or ever purchase again without being able to smell the product before hand. Seems watery also.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Teel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect this hand cream to smell like men's aftershave. Being a woman, I did not want to go around smelling like that, and the smell stayed with you. So I gave it to my husband, and he seems to be satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent of this line, because it is more woodsy and less floral than most, and this is by far the best hand rescue creme on the planet. My hands always feel terrific afterwards, and I have tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Cream For Guys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who suffers from bad dry and cracked hands once the weather gets colder. He tells me it's very effective, and quickly non-greasy. Unlike another product with shea butter, I bought him last year, no allergic reaction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing soft hands
customer_reviews.text: love their hand cream, with winter approaching I was looking for a hand cream that would last longer on my hand --- I am busy mom running around all the time. And this cream has done with it promises so well. I have tried all expensive brands as well and I would say reasonably priced and worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: love this product but the tube is sooo small and won't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand cream but may return it for a refund. If it was a "dab" that was needed it may last a bit..but it requires a "good size dab". I was excited to receive it and looked forward to buying several other scents. (this was my Mother's Day" gift to myself).
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Love the lotion, but I think the formula was changed from a year ago. The scent is more subtle. I miss the stronger scent. I use it before bed and the scent is calming.
customer_reviews.author: Asil

customer_reviews.title: Not greAsy, absorbs well, and has a heavenly fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase this year of C&E Verbana and Lavender hand cream. I put it in my purse to use when I’m out and about. It is not at all greasy, absorbs well, and has the greatest fragrance. Even though the cream is only .86 oz., it lasts a long time because you don’t need to use much.
customer_reviews.author: Sany123Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Best thing you’ll ever smell.
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this lotion is to die for. Immediately teleports you to another dimension where all is well and fields of wildflowers fill your senses with serenity. No joke though, this is a superb quality lotion. Defintely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CMANLEYSPY

customer_reviews.title: Goatmilk and Oat - Beware of overpowering scent
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted to buy some C&E hand cream in the store, so I could try them out. But alas, my local store had closed. So I took my chances online. Upon delivery, I tried this hand cream on and the scent was immediately overpowering - and smelled like men's shaving lotion. So incongruous with goatmilk and oat - you'd expect something far more mild. The scent was so undesirable I tried scrubbing it off - and it lingered after three attempts with hot soapy water and a scrub brush. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who work with their hands
customer_reviews.text: Have used this hand cream for years. Excellent moisturizer for anyone who works with their hands gardening, painting or cleaning. Non greasy formula and protects your hands in water
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Simer

customer_reviews.title: Unique lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent. Not as moisturizing as other hand creams out there, but the unique scent (Hard to describe, but I will try it’s a smooth lavender scent with a smidge of spicy scent). The sampler pack of these hand lotions are a good choice if you are unsure of which scent you like.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love the fresh Springtime scent
customer_reviews.text: This lotion has a light but wonderful flower garden scent. I had used the Nantucket Briar lotion previously and this has a much nicer scent. Have only started using so hoping it has the same skin softening effect of the Nantucket Briar.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Extra creamy
customer_reviews.text: Extra moisturizing just for the hands - I also use it on my feet. The smell is great and goes along with the body lotion and bath/shower gel.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Rose

customer_reviews.title: Miss the Gardener's Therapy scent they discontinued
customer_reviews.text: It smells okay, but the container split up the edge, and lost most of the product in the shipping box. Least thing to complain about during the pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: JLRD

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! Exactly what I wanted it to smell like. Pure tropical and just a slight hint of warmth at the end. Will repurchase. :) If you love tropical floral scents you'll love this one. It's yummy! As for the formula...crabtree & evelyn never disappoint with their ultra moisturizing hand cream. It's one of the only ones that keeps my hand moisturized longer than any others I've tried. Not to mention that my hands stay extremely soft.
customer_reviews.author: Trecah

customer_reviews.title: Turns Out, I Like Pepper in my Lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a small tube first and fell in love with the musky/smoky rose scent, so I ordered the larger size this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CREAM
customer_reviews.text: This is the cream I will use when not using organic, botanical creams. It smells delicious and feels great. I always keep a couple in my house.
customer_reviews.author: CynD-S

customer_reviews.title: Pink Magnolia scent is too strong.
customer_reviews.text: I love Crabtree & Evelyn body creams. This is a good formula, however, I was a little disappointed though because the pear scent is so understated in this lotion and the pink magnolia takes over. I wish the pear had more of presence in this lotion, but it still smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Tube seam busted in my Purse
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I have a very organized purse and I have never had this happen to me before. I can belive that the tube split open. Ruined inside of my fav. Fossil purse,
customer_reviews.author: HMK

customer_reviews.title: I am sensitive to smells and this product is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It truly is a Gardner's helper. My are constantly being washed as I am a nurse and believe me this stuff is a treat for your hands.I am sensitive to smells and this product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kajoan

customer_reviews.title: A decent hand lotion.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hand lotion that absorbs well. It doesn't feel as nourishing as I would like, though. Not the best I've ever felt, but definitely better than the cheap stuff. I was disappointed with the lack of a nice scent, but I'm sure some people like hand lotion that doesn't have a strong scent. It's worth what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: CarefulBuyer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stuff! It makes your hands so soft
customer_reviews.text: Yes I looked at the size this time...This is the best stuff! It makes your hands so soft. My hands are in water all the time and at the end of the day just a little bit will do the job! I hope they never quit making it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Very strong rose scent
customer_reviews.text: The rose scent is very, very strong. I think this scent is better suited for older women (I am still quite young), so I would not buy this scent again, but I would continue to buy hand lotions from this brand. The lotion does moisturize the hands, but it is slightly greasy for the first few minutes that you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Sufera Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Not too oily or dry
customer_reviews.text: I have moderately dry hands - caused by lifting weights in the gym - so I don't like anything that is too oily. This hand cream is the perfect balance of oily and moisturizing. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have loved this product for more than 10 years. This size is convenient and can take on an airplane. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my. I received an Amazon gift certificate and immediately moved this from the saved-for-later section to the purchase section of my cart. Generously sized tube! I would use this exclusively all over if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance, but it’s too small for the price
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love the fragrance is a light Rose. What I dislike is the size for the price
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Review:  Crabtree & Evelyn Ultra-Moisturising hand Cream
customer_reviews.text: I have used Crabtree & Evelyn Summer Hill Ultra-Moisturising Hand Therapy Cream for several years now and I love it. It works great on my extra dry skin, it smells fabulous-- a lovely scent that I don't react to, and I recommend it. Janice
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Smelling great, not leaving a greasy or sticky residue. Leaves skin soft and smooth. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Elona

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS LOTION
customer_reviews.text: and keep buying more. I love being able To keep it in my purse I find that the quality of the lotion in this tube is better/creamier than the same lotion in the bottle
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: It smells just like the name - very flowery and summery - and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lotion for years. It smells just like the name - very flowery and summery - and it's an excellent moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous fresh scent!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely long lasting scent. If you are tired of lab produced, musky scents and want a scent in lotion form that is fresh and invigorating then try Crabtree and Evelyn.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for gifts. Soft, delicate scent and the lotion is good quality. And sometimes I treat myself:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hand creme odor!
customer_reviews.text: Evelyn and Crabtree hand cremes are excellent for dry skin and cuticles with a very moisturing feel but not greasy. Smells of this particular hand creme is very strong which fades to a nice delicate citrusy smell but my husband finds it offensive when first applied.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lotion
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had paid better attention to the size though as I would have purchased a larger size had I known. It's very small and did not come in a box....just a plastic wrap. Purchased other Crabtree & Evelyn products at the same time that all were regular size and came in boxes that were better for gift giving........
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Even after one day of use, my feet are softer. Oh and it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Very small but smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo small. Purchased for boyfriend because they used it at a swanky hotel we went to and he loved the scent - but this tube is ridiculously tiny. Wish they offered a bigger one! I'd pay more for a big one.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this sent!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so lovely! I love the Rose sent! Moisterizes very well without being greasy. Definately would repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is absolutely amazing but I found the product fairly greasy and it didn’t absorb well. TINY tube... absolutely my fault for not paying attention to the size, but it’s still itty bitty purse sized.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the consistency
customer_reviews.text: I read a glowing recommendation for this hand cream online, and it was dead on. Love the consistency, the scent and - most of all - how well it works. This cream gives me immediate relief from by mildly dry hands. It's just perfect. My only complaint is the price. And given the quality of the product, I'm not overly concerned about it. A definite must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Denyse Kritschgau

customer_reviews.title: Best hand cream I’ve ever found
customer_reviews.text: This brand is a stellar producer of all things amazing but the Gardner’s Hand Therapy is my favorite because I’m sensitive to smell and it’s a nice clean scent but so subtle too. The hand creams works wonders on my rough hands that I wash dozens of times a day. I always end up sharing when I pull it out because everyone wants some.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Yucky smell
customer_reviews.text: C&E is very creamy, but the odor of this product is very unpleasant. I love verbena and I love lavender, but this reminds me of two great smells which don't belong together.
customer_reviews.author: N.D. Casalink
